name.description: The Name which should be used for this Connection Configuration.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scale_unit.description: The Scale Unit for this Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

virtual_hub_id.description: The ID of the Virtual Hub where this Point-to-Site VPN Gateway should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

vpn_server_configuration_id.description: The ID of the VPN Server Configuration which this Point-to-Site VPN Gateway should use. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

address_prefixes.description: A list of CIDR Ranges which should be used as Address Prefixes.

id.description: The ID of the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

create.description: Used when creating the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

update.description: Used when updating the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Point-to-Site VPN Gateway.
